Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: DANIEL OPOKU
Reviews.Content: Its a very good camera and I will encourage anybody who wants a digital camera with good picture quality to buy it.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX50V GPS Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <3> Spare NP-BX1 Battery for Sony +
<4> Battery Charger for NP-BX1 + <5> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <6> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod +
<7> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <8> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX50V GPS Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Black) with 64GB Card + Flash + Battery & Charger + Case + Flex Tripod + Accessory Kit
